PENDING.description: The booking is pending for available reservation response from tsp. This state can be skipped depends on the tsp.

RESERVED.description: The booking has been reserved for purchase.

PAID.description: Ticket/ride has been paid, waiting to go into active. Can be CANCELLED here

ACTIVATED.description: Booking is activated. Can be CANCELLED and will go EXPIRED if not

CANCELLED.description: Booking is cancelled, will be reconsiled, or directly RESOLVED base on terms

EXPIRED.description: The activated booking has expired. Can be reconsiled or be bought again

RECONCILING.description: Issusing for a refund due to a CANCELLED or ABANDONED booking.

REJECTED.description: The reconsilation has been RESOLVED or the reservation PENDING has been REJECTED.

PLANNED.description: The leg has been planned and saved.
The Itinerary has been planned and saved

ABANDONED.description: The Itinerary has been ABANDONED, one or more leg has been ABANDONED
